text: Zinda Laash is a 1967 Pakistani Urdu feature movie, directed by Khwaja Sarfraz. Its produced by Abdul Baqi, a Lollywood movie starring by Asad Bukhari (Dr. Aqil Harker), Habib (Aqil's Brother), Deeba (Shabnam), Rehan (Vampire), Nasreen (Vampire bride). Zinda Laash is also known as Dracula in Pakistan (USA title) and The Living Corpse (international title). It is the first movie in Pakistan to be X-rated. Category:Pakistani movies Category:1967 movies Category:Urdu-language movies
title: Zinda Laash
